viral.title: How Healthy Is Your Relationship?
viral.subtitle: Check the green and red flags together!

amazonKeywords.GREENFLAG: healthy relationships, good signs, relationship improvement
amazonKeywords.REDFLAG: relationship warning signs, toxic relationships, relationship issues

guide.purpose: This test helps you identify healthy and concerning patterns in your relationship. This is a self-awareness tool only, not professional counseling.
guide.instruction: Read each of the 25 statements and rate your agreement based on your current or past relationship experience on a 5-point scale. Honesty is most helpful.
guide.interpretation: High score: Your relationship shows healthy signs | Moderate score: Your relationship has both positive and negative patterns | Low score: Your relationship shows concerning warning signs

GREENFLAG.name: Green Flags
GREENFLAG.detail: Your partner respects you, is honest, and listens to your opinions. You build a future together and grow as individuals.
GREENFLAG.tip: üí° Cherish these signs and continue nurturing them.

REDFLAG.name: Red Flags
REDFLAG.detail: Your partner manipulates you, lies, or dismisses your feelings. The relationship may be one-sided or repeatedly harmful.
REDFLAG.tip: üí° If you see many of these signs, professional support is strongly recommended.

COMMUNICATION.name: Communication
COMMUNICATION.detail: Whether you and your partner can calmly discuss difficult topics. Open communication is the foundation of healthy relationships.
COMMUNICATION.tip: üí° Regular genuine conversations deepen mutual understanding.

RESPECT.name: Respect & Trust
RESPECT.detail: Whether your partner honors your boundaries, respects your friends/family, and values your personal space and autonomy.
RESPECT.tip: üí° Respect is the most basic element of any relationship.

GROWTH.name: Mutual Growth
GROWTH.detail: Whether you and your partner grow together and support each other's dreams and goals.
GROWTH.tip: üí° Relationships that grow together deepen over time.

items.text: My partner genuinely listens to my opinions.
My partner respects my boundaries and decisions.
I can discuss any topic honestly with my partner.
My partner respects my friends and family.
We plan for the future and share dreams together.
My partner respects my personal space and independence.
I feel confident and supported with my partner.
My partner accepts mistakes and problem-solves together.
My partner encourages and supports my goals.
I completely trust my partner.
My partner dismisses or minimizes my feelings.
My partner frequently lies to me.
My partner tries to control my behavior.
My partner becomes verbally abusive when angry.
Our relationship feels one-sided.
My partner speaks negatively about my friends or family.
My partner refuses to acknowledge their mistakes.
I feel anxious or unsafe around my partner.
My partner restricts my personal time and independence.
My partner discourages my personal growth.
We find solutions together even in difficult times.
My partner accepts me as I am.
Our relationship nurtures mutual growth.
We laugh and enjoy time together.
I feel optimistic about our future together.

ranges.description: Your relationship shows many concerning patterns. This relationship may be harmful to you.
recommendation: Talk to trusted friends or family about your situation
Consider whether leaving the relationship is necessary

ranges.description: Your relationship has both positive and negative patterns. There are areas for improvement but also hopeful signs.
recommendation: Have honest conversations with your partner about the relationship
Discuss specific areas that need improvement together
Work together to create positive change

ranges.description: Your relationship shows many healthy signs. Respect, trust, and mutual growth are present.
recommendation: Maintain the positive relationship patterns you've built
Small efforts toward improvement are always valuable
